column3: I am a little bit meh but I'll Concept ACK.\n\nYou will need to close this PR though and open a new PR though as the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) state you need to create a topic branch rather than opening it from master in your forked repo. ACK 11dd5348f741f133642704ae9b978cab74d9e20b, but please update PR title and commit description.
